attributes.action: Allow USA President Donald Trump to make a State Visit to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Donald Trump's well documented misogyny and vulgarity should not disqualify him from being received by Her Majesty the Queen or the Prince of Wales. Therefore during the term of his presidency Donald Trump should be invited to the United Kingdom for an official State Visit.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, and he should be invited to make an official State Visit and this will not cause embarrassment to Her Majesty the Queen.
